name: India Police: Beat up ragdolls.
description:
Use your bat to disperse crowds.
Get them!
They have great ragdoll physics.
Have fun with the ragdolls.
Do not leave anyone dancing on the streets.


Features:
- Indian motorcycle beat up cops.
- Realistic ragdoll physics
- The environment that mimics real-world physics
- Intuitive controls
- Real-time physical simulations
- Realistic collisions
- Incredible realism
- Procedural animation
- Compromising positions (Is that a feature?)
- New levels, ragdolls, and weapons soon!
